channel.title: This has been some wierd weather (at least for me)
channel.description:
I live in NY state and listen...
first it was like 60 Degrees Feirenheit (sp) in december, Then everything was covered in ice, but no snow, then we get these huge snowstorms out of nowhere, and in november california got a snowstorm!! how bizarre.

item.title: This has been some wierd weather (at least for me)
item.dc:creator: @omfg-oops omfg-oops
item.description:
@omfg-oops wrote:

[quote=“el lama, post:20, topic:55879”][quote author=mvp566 link=topic=79217.msg873978#msg873978 date=1170882851]
same exact thing happened here, thats why i’m on school is delayed.
[/quote]lucky, wish it snowed here[/quote] well u dont want it to snow here i cant get out me house

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @pookey71 Pookey71
item.description:
@pookey71 wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:31, topic:55879”][quote author=pookey71 link=topic=79217.msg880148#msg880148 date=1171021785]

No. It’s not orange.The light’s orange.Idiots.
[/quote]
Ah, i stared at the sun! It burns!

Everyone has Snow… Australia’s never snowed. (Not to my recollection while i’ve lived here.)
I’ve never seen snow, and want to.

Lucky basterds.[/quote]
I know

item.title: This has been some wierd weather (at least for me)
item.dc:creator: @i_pked_j00 i pked j00
item.description:
@i_pked_j00 wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:16, topic:55879”]Ha. I’d rather be hot than cold.

Temperatures are about 22 - 28 degree’s at 9am, here. Rising to about 33+ over the day.
On hot days it can get up to like 38 degree’s.

And i live right next to the pool, woo.[/quote]so would i

Read full topic

item.title: This has been some wierd weather (at least for me)
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

here in canada december and half of january (in ontario) was warm you can go outside in a t shirt then a week ago it was like hell of snow and it went from +8 to -6 then now to -15 (btw when it was -15 some dumass pulled the fireallarm and we had to stand outside and i was in gym out side in -15 with only a tshirt and shorts)

Read full topic
